title: Spaced Repetition Integration
summary: Surface lecture highlights for review at optimal intervals using spaced repetition algorithms
why: Passive note-taking leads to forgetting. Spaced repetition is proven to improve long-term retention. Automatically scheduling reviews of key concepts would make studying more effective.
flow: After generating study cards, key concepts enter spaced repetition queue. Dashboard shows what needs review today. As user reviews, algorithm adjusts intervals.
implementation: Store review metadata per concept (next review date, interval, ease factor). Daily cron or login check surfaces due items. Simple SM-2 algorithm for v1.
ux: "Review" section in dashboard. Shows cards due today. User marks "Got it" or "Forgot" â†’ adjusts future schedule. Optional push notifications for review reminders.
